name: part_012
file: tmp_【#わための誕生日2021】３Ｄお誕生日パーティー！！！【角巻わため⧸ホロライブ４期生】 [UHLdoq-T-mA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: Watame performs the song 'Genesis of Aquarion' to conclude her birthday celebration.
Final MC and outro thanking the audience.

subtitles.original: 僕の地獄に音楽は絶えない
君が繰り返し大人になって
subtitles.english: As you repeatedly become an adult

subtitles.original: 何度も何度も遠くへ行って
subtitles.english: And go far away again and again,

subtitles.original: 見守る僕が 眠れない僕が
subtitles.english: I watch over you, I who cannot sleep,

subtitles.original: くしゃくしゃになったとしても
subtitles.english: Even if I become a crumpled mess.
In order to sing your name,

subtitles.original: 一万年と二千年前から愛してる
subtitles.english: I've loved you since twelve thousand years ago.

subtitles.original: 八千年以上過ぎた頃からもっと恋しくなった
subtitles.english: Since eight thousand years passed, I've loved you even more.

subtitles.original: 一億と二千年後も愛してる
subtitles.english: I'll love you even one hundred million and two thousand years from now.

subtitles.original: 君を知ったその日から
subtitles.english: From the day I first knew you,

subtitles.original: 一万年と二千年前から
八千年以上過ぎた頃からもっと恋しくなった
subtitles.english: Since eight thousand years passed, I've loved you even more.

subtitles.original: 一億と二千年後も愛してる！
subtitles.english: I'll love you even one hundred million and two thousand years from now!

subtitles.original: 君を知ったその日から
subtitles.english: From the day I first knew you,

subtitles.original: 僕の地獄に音楽は絶えない
subtitles.english: Music never ceases in my hell.

subtitles.original: ドドドド突っ走りますのでよろしくお願いします
subtitles.english: Will keep on going full speed ahead, so please support me!

subtitles.original: 今日は本当にありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for today!
